question: 開発
sourceMnemonic: You are now <kanji>open</kanji> for <kanji>departure</kanji>. You get on your boat and leave this place. You are going to another place to start its <vocabulary>development</vocabulary>, where you will create a new world.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
